title: SharePoint Foundation 2013 (was Windows SharePoint Services or WSS4)
sessionTitle: SharePoint Foundation 2013 (was Windows SharePoint Services or WSS4)
eventShortDescription:
*Discounted* 

In this session, SSW will provide an introduction to SharePoint Foundation 2013 with the aim of evaluating its effectiveness for Enterprise Content Management (ECM).

We will also look at document and record management scenarios and taking advantage of the rich new Workflow and Content Management System.
